full_summary:
### Tender Notice
#### TICFIRE Phase A - Request for Information

**Reference Number:** WS3873891602-Doc3873913874
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** WS3873891602

**Publication Date:** September 6, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** October 16, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT (previously listed as 14:00 HNE)

**Background:**
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) intends to issue a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the System Definition Phase (Phase A) of the Thin Ice Clouds and Far InfraRed Emissions (TICFIRE) instrument, acting on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency (CSA).

**Tender Opportunity Description:**
The tender notice is available on SAP Ariba: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16806942.

**Important Amendment Notification:**
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All responses must be submitted by October 16, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT.

**Contracting Entity and End User Entities:**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
Canada
Contact: Laurie Kretzul (elle-la / she-her) at laurie.kretzul@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice URL and Attachment:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16806942

**Tender Response Requirement:**
Submissions for this tender notice must meet the system requirements and conditions specified in the SAP Ariba posting.

**Technical Information:**
Scientific or research satellites [UNSPSC: 25151704]
* Unspsc Description (French): Satellites scientifiques ou de recherche. 

**Procurement Category:** Government Departments (GD)

---

I've formatted it in a better, more readable format as per your request! I tried to include only most relevant information and rephrased sentences where necessary. I also corrected a few English errors where I spotted them. Additionally, I corrected the correction at the end regarding the time zone (I assume, after verifying the context).

Let me know if you need further assistance!
